name: Nasar
culture_notes: Riveric-influenced dialect with Coastal Tongues loanwords
diet heavy on smoked fish, pickled salt provisions
tide-based ritual calendar governs fishing seasons
boatbuilding and ropework are prized crafts
quest_hook_slots: disappearances at night on the river
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
limited combustion industry (no high-pressure steam tech)
notes: small tidal harbor at river mouth; docks shift each season
legal authority unclear (state unknown) â€” frequent charter disputes
